glossdef.p: Prospective application of a change in accounting policy and of recognising the effect of a change in an accounting estimate, respectively, are:

li.p: applying the new accounting policy to transactions, other events and conditions occurring after the date as at which the policy is changed; and
recognising the effect of the change in the accounting estimate in the current and future periods affected by the change.
